name: Into The Wave II
description: Channeling the power and energy of the sea in paint. Getting lost in the action of painting and sharing that through pixels. When I paint I get lost in the act. The world disappears around me and there is only the paint. Watercolor painting layered in Blender to share the that feeling of immersion in the creative process. 1 of 1. Go to @wirewove to find out more about how I made this.
